title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository providing the CLI and server to run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally with minimal setup.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library that wraps the Ollama REST API, enabling easy integration of local LLMs into Python applications.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, allowing Node.js and browser apps to interact with the local Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that adds Ollama as a provider for LLM, embeddings and retriever components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (now renamed ‘Open WebUI’) that offers a ChatGPT-like interface for local models.

title: ollama-hass
summary: Home Assistant custom integration exposing Ollama LLMs as conversation agents for smart-home automations.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Interactive CLI chat wrapper written in Go that adds conversation memory and prompt templates to the Ollama CLI.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented-generation example using Ollama embeddings and Chroma vector store for question-answering over documents.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings Ollama-powered code completion and inline chat similar to GitHub Copilot but fully local.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Self-hosted Telegram bot that forwards user messages to a local Ollama instance and streams replies back into any chat.

title: ollama-node
summary: Community npm package offering a lightweight Node.js wrapper around the Ollama REST API with TypeScript support.

title: ollama-py
summary: Unofficial PyPI package providing synchronous and asynchronous Python clients for the Ollama API plus helper utilities.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java SDK for Ollama offering fluent builders, streaming chat, and Spring Boot starters to integrate local LLMs into JVM apps.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API with tokio support and examples.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama responses into servers, supports slash commands, model switching and per-user quotas.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that containerizes Ollama models and pipelines for reproducible CI/CD workflows and cloud deployments.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that connects to Ollama, shows markdown code blocks and lets users pick models from a sidebar.

title: ollama-n8n
summary: Official n8n community node that adds Ollama as an AI operation in no-code workflows for text generation and chat.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir library wrapping the Ollama API with GenServer behavior for fault-tolerant LLM integrations in Phoenix applications.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support, PVC caching and autoscaling options.
